FuncDef: The section command configures the IP address segment in an IP address pool. The undo section command deletes the configured IP address segment in an IP address pool. By default, the IP address segment in an IP address pool is not configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of the address segment in the IP address pool.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 255.

Specifies the start IP address of an address segment.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the end IP address of the address segment. The end IP address must be larger than the start IP address. If the end IP address is not entered, there is only one address in the address segment.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.
